meanings.sent1: During the talent show, Sarah performed a beautiful choree.
meanings.sent2: The choree at the end of the musical was energetic and fun.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's choree across the ice made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her choree was like a graceful swan gliding across the water.
meanings.sent5: The choree of the leaves falling from the trees was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: The ballet class practiced a new choree for the recital.
meanings.sent2: The choree in the second act was full of jumps and spins.
meanings.sent3: The mice in the Nutcracker ballet had a comical choree.
meanings.sent4: The choree of the dancers resembled a flock of birds taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The choree of the flowers in the ballet was delicate and precise.
